text: Futanari is the Japanese word for hermaphroditism, or androgyny. Krauss, Friedrich Salomo et al. Japanisches Geschlechtsleben: Abhandlungen und Erhebungen Ã¼ber das Geschlechtsleben des japanischen Volkes ; folkloristische Studien, Schustek, 1965 Outside Japan, the word is used to refer to a hentai genre about feminine characters who have a penis and vulva, as well as a scrotum in some cases. The term is also often shortened to futa. ==Related pages== *Oyamakui no Kami *Intersex ==References== Category:Japanese words and phrases Category:Anime and manga terms Category:LGBT Category:Pornography
title: Futanari
